inclusion.criterion: Affected by a major sickle cell SS or Sβ thalassemia
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: lab study: Hgb: 8 g/dl, Hemoglobine electrophoresis: 91% HbS 6%HbF 3%HbA2

inclusion.criterion: Have the potential indication of allogenic bone marrow
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a general condition corresponding to a functional index of Lansky ≥ 80%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have been treated and followed for at least the previous two years in a specialized center
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Severe recurrent vaso-occlusive episodes of duration > 48 hours or having required hospitalization for more than 24 hours
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Recurrent Acute Chest Syndrome (at least 2 episodes)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presence of sickle cell cardiomyopathy documented by Doppler echocardiography
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient who to his knowledge and that of the investigator, is unable to follow the visits required by the protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any form of disorder that, according to the investigator, may compromise the ability of the patient to give an informed written consent and / or to conform to all required procedures of the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Positive serology for HIV-1/2, HTLV-1/2, syphilis, HCV and / or HBsAg
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: lab study: AST: 22 U/L, ALT: 43 U/L, Alk P: 53 U/L

exclusion.criterion: Bacterial, viral, fungal or parasitic active infection with clinical signs requiring hospitalization for more than 24 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Personal history of cancer, myeloproliferative hematopathy or immune deficiency
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a known history of sickle cell disease and has been experiencing severe pain in his lower back that radiated to both thighs. He has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood.
